Name: Chonky - From Breakfast to Domination
About the game: Chonky - From Breakfast to Domination takes you on a journey through an oldschool RPG with an endearing optic. Slay monsters, collect weapons, armor and other items and discover new skills to improve yourself. Sadly, Chonkys are not the brightest and therefore do not possess the knowledge of how they can acquire new skills: Experiment and try new things to unlock them! Maybe setting yourself on fire will help? Go out, have fun and blow up some of those pesky Spoders and fight your way from breakfast to domination. (And do not forget to take your lunch with you!) Key Features üîß Hidden Skill Tree: Experiment to acquire powerful skills! ‚öîÔ∏è Diverse Combat: Melee combat with 9 unique weapon classes, dozens of unique skills and abilities, and 30 unique weapons with randomized stats using our prefix system make sure you will never be bored! üèïÔ∏è Vibrant Environments: Be it a forest or fields ‚Äì all are carefully crafted to be cute and pleasant to look at! üêâ Chonk Appeal: Everything is chonky and Chonky is everything. OH LAWD THEY COMIN!
